author: Cavan Sieczkowski
title: Steve Harvey Tells Warren Beatty To Give Him A Call After Oscar Flub
text:
Steve Harvey Tells Warren Beatty To Give Him A Call After Oscar Flub "YOU KNOW I have something to say ğŸ˜‚ " By Cavan Sieczkowski 
Steve Harvey knows a thing or two about mistakes at live awards shows. 
The comedian tweeted Monday morning that Warren Beatty should give him a call after the actor and Faye Dunaway mistakenly presented â€œLa La Landâ€ with the Best Picture award on Sunday, even though â€œMoonlightâ€ was the actual winner. 
â€œI opened the envelope and it said, â€˜Emma Stone, â€˜La La Land,â€™â€™â€ Beatty said onstage after realizing that he had the incorrect envelope. â€œThatâ€™s why I took such a long look at Faye and at you â€• I wasnâ€™t trying to be funny ... This is â€˜Moonlight,â€™ the Best Picture.â€ 
Back in 2015, Harvey mistakenly crowned the wrong Miss Universe during the live pageant. Good morning everybody! Went to sleep early last night. So... what I miss? #Oscars â€” Steve Harvey (@IAmSteveHarvey) February 27, 2017 Tune in to @SteveHarveyFM at 8 AM ET today for my response to last night's #Oscars . YOU KNOW I have something to say ğŸ˜‚ â€” Steve Harvey (@IAmSteveHarvey) February 27, 2017 Call me Warren Beatty. I can help you get through this! #Oscars â€” Steve Harvey (@IAmSteveHarvey) February 27, 2017 
The humor of the moment was not lost on social media. Comparisons to Harvey were made. Laughs were had. "Nobody can f*** up an awards show again, right?"-Steve Harvey"Hold my beer." - #Oscars Staff â€” Josh Macuga (@JoshMacuga) February 27, 2017 Steve Harvey sitting at the crib like...
